anya-e0811n0:6_0: Saraṇaṃ pāṇinaṃ vāṇī, mayhaṃ pīṇayataṃ manaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:10_0: Tathāpi tu vaḷañjenti, suddhamāgadhikā na te.
anya-e0811n0:19_0: Kiṃ tehi pādasussūsā, yesaṃ natthi garūni’ha;
anya-e0811n0:26_0: Yena tosenti viññū ye, tattha pya’vihitā’darā.
anya-e0811n0:28_0: Bandho ca nāma sadda,tthā, sahitā dosavajjitā;
anya-e0811n0:29_0: Pajja gajja vimissānaṃ, bhedenā’yaṃ tidhā bhave.
anya-e0811n0:31_0: Nibandho cā’nibandho ca, puna dvidhā niruppate;
anya-e0811n0:35_0: Alaṅkatā’va sobhante, kiṃ nu te nira’laṅkatā?
anya-e0811n0:38_0: Sampāpuṇe na viññūhi, hassabhāvaṃ kathaṃ nu so?
anya-e0811n0:47_0: Pasaṃsiyā na viññūhi, sā kaññā viya tādisī.
anya-e0811n0:50_0: Niddosā sabbathā sā’yaṃ, saguṇā na bhaveyya kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:55_0: Pade vākye tadatthe ca, dosā ye vividhā matā;
anya-e0811n0:73_0: Adhippete yathā megho, visado sukhaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:75_0: Visesya madhikaṃ yenā, jhattha metaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n0:79_0: Kiliṭṭhaṃ taṃ yathā tāya, so’ya māliṅgyate piyā.
anya-e0811n0:88_0: Yamakaṃ tañca pādāna, mādi, majjha, nta, gocaraṃ.
anya-e0811n0:99_0: Sādaraṃ sā daraṃ hantu, vihitā vihitā mayā;
anya-e0811n0:104_0: Sugato sugato lokaṃ, sahitaṃ sa hitaṃ karaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:112_0: Yamakaṃ taṃ pahelī paheḷi (ka.) ca, nekantamadhurāni’ti;
anya-e0811n0:118_0: Ya dappatīta mānīya, vattabbaṃ neyya māhu taṃ;
anya-e0811n0:119_0: Yathā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti rattiyaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:121_0: Nedisaṃ bahu maññanti, sabbe sabbattha viññuno;
anya-e0811n0:124_0: Siyā visesanāpekkhaṃ, yaṃ taṃ patvā visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:125_0: Sātthakaṃ taṃ yathā taṃ so, bhiyyo passati cakkhunā.
anya-e0811n0:127_0: Hīnaṃ kare visesyaṃ yaṃ, taṃ hīnatthaṃ bhave yathā;
anya-e0811n0:131_0: Yathā hi vande buddhassa, pādapaṅkeruhaṃ pi ca.
anya-e0811n0:134_0: Saddato atthato vuttaṃ, yattha bhiyyopi vuccati;
anya-e0811n0:135_0: Ta mekatthaṃ yathā’bhāti, vārido vārido ayaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:142_0: Kāpi paññā, kopi paguṇo, pakatīpi aho tava.
anya-e0811n0:151_0: Kaññe kāmayamānaṃ maṃ, na kāmayasi kiṃnvi’daṃ?
anya-e0811n0:154_0: Tampi gāmmaṃ tya’bhimataṃ, yathā yābhavato piyā.
anya-e0811n0:156_0: Vuttesu sūcite ṭṭhāne, padacchedo bhave yati;
anya-e0811n0:157_0: Yaṃ tāya hīnaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, yatihīnanti sā pana.
anya-e0811n0:163_0: Taṃ name sirasā cāmi, karavaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n0:164_0: Sakalāpi disā siñca, tiva soṇṇarasehi yo.
anya-e0811n0:166_0: Saro sandhimhi pubbanto, viya lope vibhattiyā;
anya-e0811n0:173_0: Name taṃ sirasā sabbo, pamā’tītaṃ tathāgataṃ;
anya-e0811n0:174_0: Yassa lokaggataṃ patta, sso’pamā na hi yujjati.
anya-e0811n0:176_0: Munindaṃ taṃ sadā vandā, mya’nantamati muttamaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:177_0: Yassa paññā ca mettā ca, nissīmāti vijambhati.
anya-e0811n0:181_0: Paṇamāmi jinaṃ taṃ pa, varaṃ varaguṇā’layaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:184_0: Khettaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, desaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:190_0: Gāviputto balibaddho, tiṇaṃ khādī pivī jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:192_0: Bandhe pharusatā yattha, taṃ bandhapharusaṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n0:193_0: Kharā khilā parikkhīṇā, khette khittaṃ phalatya’laṃ.
anya-e0811n0:201_0: Bhoga, saggādi, nibbāna, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n0:205_0: Mayekasmiṃ guṇā sabbe, yato samuditā ahuṃ.
anya-e0811n0:208_0: Yācito’haṃ kathaṃ nāma, na dajjāmya’pi jīvitaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:213_0: Vise siṅgimhi nadiyaṃ, roge rājakulamhi ca.
anya-e0811n0:219_0: Vākyatthato duppatīti, karaṃ gāmmaṃ mataṃ yathā;
anya-e0811n0:220_0: Poso vīriyavā so’yaṃ, paraṃ hantvā na vissamī.
anya-e0811n0:242_0: Taṃ kathaṃ nāma megho’yaṃ, visado sukhaye janaṃ?
anya-e0811n0:246_0: Paṇītopi rasā’peto, cittā me sāmi te gati.
anya-e0811n0:252_0: Pahelikāya paheḷikāya (ka.) māruḷhā, na hi duṭṭhā kiliṭṭhatā;
anya-e0811n0:253_0: Piyā sukhā’liṅgitaṃ ka, māliṅgati nu no iti.
anya-e0811n0:256_0: Tato yamaka maññaṃ tu, sabba metaṃmayaṃ viya.
anya-e0811n0:268_0: Tantissara virodho so, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ?
anya-e0811n0:284_0: Imā sabbāpi dhavalā, disā rocanti nibbharaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:306_0: Sappo sappo! Ayaṃ handa, nivattatu bhavaṃ tato,
anya-e0811n0:325_0: Dunoti kāmacaṇḍālo, so maṃ sadaya niddayo;
anya-e0811n0:329_0: Yato na savanu’bbegaṃ, heṭṭhā yesaṃ vicāritaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:333_0: Desaṃ vā dehi gāmaṃ vā, khettaṃ vā mama sobhanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:355_0: Nibbāna, bhoga, saggādi, sādhanāni na saṃsayo.
anya-e0811n0:367_0: Ocityaṃ nāma viññeyyaṃ, loke vikhyāta mādarā;
anya-e0811n0:376_0: Tiṇāyapi na maññittha, so vo detu jayaṃ jino.
anya-e0811n0:387_0: Pasāda mācare niccaṃ, sajjane saguṇepi ca.
anya-e0811n0:417_0: Dassessaṃ te tato dāni, sadde sambhūsayanti ye.
anya-e0811n0:438_0: Muninda manda sañjāta, hāsa candana limpitā;
anya-e0811n0:442_0: Yaṃ pāriṇatyaṃ hotī’ha, sopi ojo’va taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n0:448_0: Yato puññena te sentu, jina pāda’mbujadvaye.
anya-e0811n0:454_0: Siyā samasuti pubbā, vaṇṇā’vutti paro yathā.
anya-e0811n0:457_0: Tadā pabhuti dhammassa, loke jāto mahu’ssavo.
anya-e0811n0:465_0: Mudūhi vā kevalehi, kevalehi phuṭehi vā,
anya-e0811n0:466_0: Missehi vā tidhā hoti, vaṇṇehi samatā yathā.
anya-e0811n0:470_0: Hadayaṅgamataṃ yāti, sataṃ deti ca nibbutiṃ.
anya-e0811n0:484_0: Caranti sādhū sādhu (sī-chandhānurakkhaṇatthaṃ) sambuddha, kāle keḷiparammukhā.
anya-e0811n0:496_0: Sabandhagāravo so’yaṃ, sileso nāma taṃ yathā.
anya-e0811n0:504_0: Pādambhoja rajo litta, gattā ye tava gotama;
anya-e0811n0:505_0: Aho! Te jantavo yanti, sabbathā nirajattanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:510_0: Udāro sopi viññeyyo, yaṃ pasattha visesanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:533_0: Apāṇe pāṇīnaṃ dhammo, sammā ādhīyate kvaci,;
anya-e0811n0:541_0: Uṇṇā puṇṇi’ndunā nātha! Divāpi saha saṅgamā;
anya-e0811n0:549_0: Madhurepi guṇe dhīra, na’ppasīdanti ye tava;
anya-e0811n0:554_0: Disā samantā dhāvanti, kundasobhā sa lakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n0:566_0: Atisundara maññaṃ tu, kāmaṃ vindati gāmmataṃ.
anya-e0811n0:575_0: Bhāsanto madhuraṃ dhammaṃ, kaṃ na sappīṇaye janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:587_0: Accantakantā kantā yato accantakantā (ka.) va vuccante te tato’dhunā.
anya-e0811n0:593_0: Līlā vikanti subhago, disā thira vilokano;
anya-e0811n0:611_0: Parivutti, bbhamo, bhāvo, missa, māsī, rasī, iti.
anya-e0811n0:613_0: Ete bhedā samuddiṭṭhā, bhāvo jīvita muccate;
anya-e0811n0:614_0: Vaṅkavuttīsu posesi, sileso tu siriṃ paraṃ.
anya-e0811n0:625_0: Nā’laṃ hantuṃ jine’saṃ tvaṃ, taṇhaṃ taṇhāharopi kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:628_0: Sadda, tthagammā, vākyattha, visayā,ti ca sā bhidhā.
anya-e0811n0:630_0: Samāsa, paccaye, vā’dī, saddā tesaṃ vasā tidhā;
anya-e0811n0:636_0: Ivādī iva, vā, tulya, samāna, nibha, sannibhā;
anya-e0811n0:639_0: Sarī, sarikkha, saṃvādī, virodhi, sadisā, viya;
anya-e0811n0:643_0: Savaṇṇā, bhā, paṭinidhi, sadhammā, di salakkhaṇā.
anya-e0811n0:648_0: Tassa coreti sobhaggaṃ, tassa kantiṃ vilumpati;
anya-e0811n0:651_0: Kacchaṃ vigāhate, tassa, ta manvetya, nubandhati;
anya-e0811n0:675_0: Khayī cando, bahurajaṃ, padumaṃ, tehi te mukhaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:688_0: Samāsa, ppaccaye, vādi, saddayogaṃ vinā api.
anya-e0811n0:714_0: Uddhaṃ samuggatassā’pi, kiṃ te canda vijambhanā.
anya-e0811n0:719_0: Haṃsī’vā’yaṃ sasī bhinna, liṅgā, kāsaṃ sarāni’va;
anya-e0811n0:720_0: Vijāti vacanā, hīnā, sā’va bhatto bhaṭo’dhipe.
anya-e0811n0:729_0: Karonti cā’daraṃ dhīrā, payoge kvaci de’va tu.
anya-e0811n0:732_0: Piyo pāṇā ivā’yaṃ me, vijjā dhana’miva’ccitā.
anya-e0811n0:740_0: Asesa vatthu visayaṃ, ekadesa vivutti vivatti (ṭīkā), ca;
anya-e0811n0:741_0: Taṃ dvidhā puna paccekaṃ, samāsādivasā tidhā.
anya-e0811n0:745_0: Sirasā na pilandhanti, ke muninda pada’mbujaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:748_0: Ratanāni guṇā bhūrī, karuṇā sītalaṃ jalaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:760_0: Sukhaṃ ke vā na vindanti, passantā munino mukhaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:770_0: Rūpakāni bahūnye’va ṭīkāyaṃ uddhaṭaṃ yuttarūpakaṃ sitapupphujalaṃ lola,
anya-e0811n0:777_0: Natthi yaṃ tena viññeyyaṃ, avutta manumānato.
anya-e0811n0:779_0: Punappuna muccāraṇaṃ punappunuccāraṇaṃ yaṃ, yamatthassa, padassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:783_0: Mano harati sabbesaṃ, ādadāti disā dasa;
anya-e0811n0:788_0: Vibhā senti ca sabbāpi, candādīnaṃ hatā viya.
anya-e0811n0:791_0: Jitvā viharati klesa, ripuṃ loke jino ayaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:795_0: Dīpakaṃ nāma taṃ cādi, majjha, ntavisayaṃ tidhā.
anya-e0811n0:807_0: Jinā’nani’ndu indu ca, kassa nā’nandako bhave.
anya-e0811n0:811_0: Taṃ pītihetu, sā cā’yaṃ, passaddhyā’di pasiddhiyā.
anya-e0811n0:822_0: Ekākī’ nekasenaṃ taṃ, māraṃ sa vijayī jino;
anya-e0811n0:823_0: Kathaṃ ta mathavā tassa, pāramībala mīdisaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:827_0: Paṇāmo nanu so ye’va, sakimpi sugate gato.
anya-e0811n0:830_0: Saccaṃ na te gamissanti, sivaṃ sujanagocaraṃ;
anya-e0811n0:831_0: Micchādiṭṭhi parikkanta parikanta (ka.), mānasā ye sudujjanā.
anya-e0811n0:838_0: Tepi lokahitā sattā, sūriyo candimā api;
anya-e0811n0:839_0: Atthaṃ passa gamissanti, niyamo kena laṅghyate.
anya-e0811n0:843_0: Gato’va nibbutiṃ sabbe, saṅkhārā na hi sassatā.
anya-e0811n0:846_0: Jino saṃsārakantārā, janaṃ pāpeti pāpesi (ka.) nibbutiṃ;
anya-e0811n0:847_0: Nanu yuttā gati sā’yaṃ, vesārajja samaṅginaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:851_0: Sayaṃ rāgaparītā hi, pare rañjenti saṅgate.
anya-e0811n0:853_0: Vācce gamme tha vatthūnaṃ, sadisatte pabhedanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:858_0: Tulyo tva masi bhedo tu, sarīrene’disena te.
anya-e0811n0:880_0: Na hoti khalu dujjanya, mapi dujjanasaṅgame;
anya-e0811n0:883_0: Janako, ñāpako ceti, duvidhā hetavo siyuṃ;
anya-e0811n0:890_0: Munino desanā’yaṃ me, kāmaṃ toseti mānasaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:912_0: Ālāpa hāsa līḷāhi, muninda! Vijayā tava;
anya-e0811n0:913_0: Kokilā kumudāni co, pasevante vanaṃ jalaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:918_0: Pītiyā me samuppannā, santa! Sandassanā tava;
anya-e0811n0:919_0: Kālenā’yaṃ bhave pīti, tave’va puna dassanā.
anya-e0811n0:946_0: Vasaṃ nenti’va dhīraṃ taṃ, tadā yogā’bhiyogato.
anya-e0811n0:953_0: Muninda! Pādadvande te, cāru rājiva sundare;
anya-e0811n0:956_0: Maññe, saṅke, dhuvaṃ, nūna, miva, micceva mādihi;
anya-e0811n0:957_0: Sā’yaṃ byañjīyate kvā’pi, kvā’pi vākyena gamyate.
anya-e0811n0:961_0: Pīṇentā jina! Te sādhu, janaṃ sarasataṃ nayuṃ.
anya-e0811n0:975_0: Thutiṃ karoti nindanto, viya taṃ byājavaṇṇanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:976_0: Dosā’bhāsā guṇā eva, yanti sannidhi matra hi.
anya-e0811n0:979_0: Visesaṃ tāvatā nātha!, Guṇānaṃ te vadāma kiṃ?
anya-e0811n0:981_0: Visesi’cchāyaṃ dabbassa, kriyā, jāti, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:982_0: Vekalladassanaṃ yatra, viseso nāma yaṃ bhave.
anya-e0811n0:984_0: Na rathā, na ca mātaṅgā, na hayā, na padātayo;
anya-e0811n0:988_0: Na baddhā bhūkuṭi, neva, phurito dasanacchado;
anya-e0811n0:989_0: Mārāribhaṅgaṃ cā’kāsi, muni vīro varo sayaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:997_0: Na kharaṃ, na hi vā thaddhaṃ, muninda! Vacanaṃ tava;
anya-e0811n0:1005_0: Puttā me pādasambhattā, sajjā sante’va tādise.
anya-e0811n0:1019_0: Sugato visadaṃ pātu, pāṇinaṃ so vināyako.
anya-e0811n0:1022_0: Viruddhā, viruddhā, bhinna, kammā, niyamavā, paro;
anya-e0811n0:1025_0: Ocitya samposakādi, sileso, padajā’di padajāti (ka.) pi;
anya-e0811n0:1034_0: Suṇanti vācaṃ munino, janā passanti cā’mataṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1038_0: Mano pīṇeti jantūnaṃ, jino vācāya bhāya ca.
anya-e0811n0:1056_0: Sadayo pya’dayo pāpe, cittā’yaṃ munino gati.
anya-e0811n0:1063_0: Saṃkittanaṃ bhavati yaṃ, sā matā tulyayogitā.
anya-e0811n0:1066_0: Ubhohi raṃsimālī ca, bhagavā ca tamonudo.
anya-e0811n0:1068_0: Atthantaraṃ sādhayatā, kiñci taṃ sadisaṃ phalaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1069_0: Dassīyate asantaṃ vā, santaṃ vā taṃ nidassanaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1084_0: Purā paraṃ siriṃ vindi, bodhisatto’ bhinikkhamā.
anya-e0811n0:1087_0: Satto sambodhiyaṃ bodhi, satto sattahitāya so;
anya-e0811n0:1090_0: Gopetvā vaṇṇanīyaṃ yaṃ, kiñci dassīyate paraṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1091_0: Asamaṃ vā samaṃ tassa, yadi sā vañcanā matā.
anya-e0811n0:1094_0: Purato na sahassesu, na pañcesu ca tādino;
anya-e0811n0:1099_0: Sampuṇṇo candimā nā’yaṃ, chatta metaṃ manobhuno.
anya-e0811n0:1108_0: Siyā ekāvali sā’yaṃ, dvidhā vidhi, nisedhato.
anya-e0811n0:1111_0: Pādā nakhāli rucirā, nakhāli raṃsi bhāsurā;
anya-e0811n0:1117_0: Nā’layo yo sa jantūnaṃ, nā’nanta byasanā vaho.
anya-e0811n0:1119_0: Yahiṃ bhūsiya bhūsattaṃ, aññamaññaṃ tu vatthunaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1123_0: Mahantiṃ vindatī kantiṃ, sopi teneva tādisiṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1125_0: Kathanaṃ sahabhāvassa, kriyāya ca, guṇassa ca;
anya-e0811n0:1129_0: Jalanti candaraṃsīhi, samaṃ satthu nakhaṃ savo;
anya-e0811n0:1134_0: Pāpaṃ disā suvimalā, saha sajjana cetasā.
anya-e0811n0:1139_0: Guṇā sabhāva madhurā, api loke’ka bandhuno;
anya-e0811n0:1142_0: Yassa kassa ci dānena, yassa kassa ci vatthuno;
anya-e0811n0:1146_0: Muninā samanuppattā, dāni sabbaññutāsirī muninda! samanuppatto, dāni sabbaññutāsiriṃ (ka.).
anya-e0811n0:1149_0: Saṃsayā’pagataṃ vatthuṃ, yattha so’yaṃ bhamo mato.
anya-e0811n0:1155_0: Yena kenaci vaṇṇena, bhāvo nāmā’ya mīrito.
anya-e0811n0:1157_0: Nanu teye’va santāno, sāgarā na kulācalā;
anya-e0811n0:1158_0: Manampi mariyādaṃ ye, saṃvaṭṭepi jahanti no.
anya-e0811n0:1160_0: Aṅgaṅgi bhāvā sadisa, balabhāvā ca bandhane;
anya-e0811n0:1164_0: Pasatthā munino pāda, nakha raṃsi mahānadī;
anya-e0811n0:1165_0: Aho! Gāḷhaṃ nimuggepi, sukhayatye’va te jane.
anya-e0811n0:1168_0: Veso sabhāva madhuro, rūpaṃ netta rasāyanaṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1169_0: Madhū’va munino vācā, na sampīṇeti kaṃ janaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1186_0: Ko nāma passitu malaṃ khalu tāsa mantaṃ.
anya-e0811n0:1199_0: Citta vutti visesā tu, bhāvayanti rase yato;
anya-e0811n0:1209_0: Jigucchā, vimhayo, ceva, samo ca nava ṭhāyino.
anya-e0811n0:1213_0: Ye te caranti sīlena, te honti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n0:1227_0: Sattikā sātvikā (ka.) pya’nubhāvatte, visuṃ bhāvā bhavanti te.
anya-e0811n0:1230_0: Thambho, paḷaya, romañcā, tathā seda, ssu, vepathu;
anya-e0811n0:1233_0: Yadā ratyādayo bhāvā, ṭhitisīlā na honti ce;
anya-e0811n0:1234_0: Tadā sabbepi te bhāvā, bhavanti byabhicārino.
anya-e0811n0:1255_0: Assādiyatta mānīya, māno ṭhāye’va so raso.
anya-e0811n0:1268_0: Yutyā bhāvānubhāvā te, nibandhā posayanti naṃ;
anya-e0811n0:1283_0: Jeṭṭhe majjhe’dhameti ettha majjhe adhameti padacchedo majjhe’dhame ca kamaso.
